skills.name: Apportation
skills.desc: Transport pickupable items in the target area into your inventory.

skills.name: Blessed Smoke Cloud
skills.desc: Conjure a cloud of thick blessed smoke that makes characters invisible.

skills.name: Blinding Radiance
skills.desc: Enemies around you receive [X] air damage. Every enemy withint a 5m radius turns blind.
skills.special: 100% chance to cast an aura for 1 turn.

skills.name: Breathing Bubble
skills.desc: Creates a bubble of clean air around your head, allowing you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces. Immune to Suffocation and Silence.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.desc: Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to 8 times in a 8m radius and deals [X] Air Damage to each target.
skills.special: Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

skills.name: Closed Circuit
skills.desc: Deals [X] Air Damage to enemies around you; then creates cursed static clouds on the edges of the spell.
skills.special: Sets Air Immunity for 1 turn(s). Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

skills.name: Dazing Bolt
skills.desc: An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [X] Air Damage to characters and items in the area, and setting Shocked status.
skills.special: Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Electric Discharge
skills.desc: An electrical jolt deals air damage to target character. Sets status Shocked.
skills.special: Sets shocked for 2 turns. Damage is based on skill level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Erratic Wisp
skills.desc: Cause target character to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Air Resistance by 40%.

skills.name: Evasive Aura
skills.desc: Sets Evasive Aura for you and allies around you. Dodging chance is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 1m.

skills.name: Favourable Wind
skills.desc: Control the forces of nature so the wind is literally at your party's back. An aura increases you allies' movement speeds while they stay close to you.
skills.special: Sets Favourable Winds Aura for 4 turn(s).

skills.name: Mass Breathing Bubbles
skills.desc: Set Breathing Bubbles on allies around you, allowing them to ignore effects of cloud surfaces and making them immune to Suffocation and Silence.
skills.special: Sets Mass Breathing Bubbles for 5 turn(s).

skills.name: Nether Swamp
skills.desc: Make two characters switch places. One of the characters can be you.

skills.name: Pressure Spike
skills.desc: Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals air damage to enemies and douses fire.
skills.special: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Shocking Touch
skills.desc: Stuns nearby enemies and deals [X] air damage.
skills.special: Sets shocked for 2 turns. Damage is based on skill level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Smoke Cover
skills.desc: Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding from sight.

skills.name: Superconductor
skills.desc: Shoot forking spikes at all enemies within the area, dealing [X] Air Damage and setting Shocked.
skills.special: Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Teleportation
skills.desc: Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing.
skills.special: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.desc: A storm rages in the target area, hitting enemies with lightning bolts for 3 turns.

skills.name: Tornado
skills.desc: A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.

skills.name: Uncanny Evasion
skills.desc: Target character's dodging is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Vacuum Aura
skills.desc: Deal [X] Air Damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies.
skills.special: Sets Vacuum Aura for 3 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence

skills.name: Vacuum Touch
skills.desc: Deal [X] Air Damage. Set Suffocation and Silence on target.
skills.special: Sets Suffocating for 1 turn(s). Sets Silenced for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Vaporize
skills.desc: Remove Petrified and Frozen from target character. Vaporise ground surfaces into clouds. Does not work on Oil, Ice or Lava surfaces
